#MasanobuFukuoka #RuthStout #gardener #vegetableGardener#VegetableGardening #Homestead #Foraging #forager #Mushrooms #DIY #LowEffortGardening #NoPlow #NoTill #GrowYourOwn #GrrowYourOwnFood #SeedSaving #HeirloomSeeds #HeirloomVarieties #Kiwi #PawPaw #EdibleLandscape
A lifelong lover of #nature and have been capturing it on camera since March 2022. All pictures here will be my own unless otherwise stated.

I've been exploring of the natural world from boyhood, and photographing #nature and #wildlife for over 40 years. Here to share images, info and insights, along with conservation messages and a sense of humour.

Header image: Ten Puffins (one lying down, the others standing, most facing towards the right of the image) on a Skomer clifftop.

Avatar: A Peacock Butterfly on white Buddleia flowers.

Walking the woods and brooks of western Massachusetts.

Taught nature programs for 18 years.

All critters great & small… but mostly small.
